ABTS radical scavenging assay. ABTS scavenging activity of the different plant extracts was determined as described by Unuofin et al.
20 . A mixture was prepared by reacting 7 mM ABTS solution and 2.45 mM K 2S 2O8 (1:1), which was kept in the dark for 12 hours to produce a bluish green coloration. The solution was adjusted with methanol until an absorbance of 0.700 Â± 0.01 at 734 nm was obtained. 1mL of plant extract was allowed to react with 1 mL of the working solution and the absorbance was measured at 734 nm after 7 min.
